text:
GEORGE CLOONEY NEWS AND UPDATES ON MOVIES AND WIFE AMAL

Holy cramp Batman! Why is your new movie 3 hours long? There could be a cracking film here with plenty of relish but when you stretch a narrative arc you end up with a flat line: BRIAN VINER reviews The Batman Those of us old enough to remember Adam West's Batman in the Sixties TV series, complete with pop-art 'Pow!' and 'Thwack!' graphics, have since seen the Caped Crusader fly a long way - although not necessarily in the right direction. George Clooney, Val Kilmer, Michael Keaton, Christian Bale and Ben Affleck are among the stars who have subsequently played the scourge of the Gotham City underworld, and now, in the latest big-budget reboot of the DC Comics franchise, The Batman, it's the turn of British actor Robert Pattinson. He's perfectly fine both as billionaire Bruce Wayne and his crime-busting alter ego, although the extravagant length of this movie, at just a Zzzzz! under three hours, made me decidedly nostalgic for the caped capers of Batman and his sidekick Robin in the long-ago telly version. ...read The Batman reviewed by Brian Viner

Prominent Putin propagandist rages on live TV about losing his Italian villa - which is next to George Clooney's - because of sanctions over Russia's invasion of Ukraine 'Is this the Iron Curtain?' said Vladimir Soloviev, on his late-night program after learning sanctions by Italian officials would hinder his access to a pair of properties he owns off Lake Como. Prominent Putin propagandist rages on-air about losing Italian villas

Julia Roberts attempts to go incognito in a hooded sweater and sunglasses as she boards private jet out of Australia after wrapping up filming Ticket to Paradise Julia Roberts prepared to board a private jet out of Australia on Saturday as filming for her new romantic comedy Ticket to Paradise wrapped up on the Gold Coast. Julia Roberts prepares to board a flight back home from the Gold Coast

Julia Roberts sports a lilac jumpsuit and sun hat as she continues filming Ticket to Paradise alongside Billie Lourd on the Gold Coast It was reported in January that Julia Roberts and George Clooney had returned home to the US, after production on Ticket to Paradise was shut down due to a Covid outbreak in Queensland. Julia Roberts films Ticket to Paradise in lilac jumpsuit on Gold Coast

Cindy Crawford and husband Rande Gerber attend Casamigos pre-Super Bowl bash in Beverly Hills alongside NFL quarterbacks The nineties supermodel - turning 56 in one week - famously appeared in Pepsi's iconic Super Bowl XXVI commercial in 1992 Cindy Crawford and hubby Rande Gerber attend Casamigos Super Bowl bash

Belfast director Kenneth Branagah responds to his historic Oscar nominations and the snub of his leading lady Caitroina Balfe Director Kenneth Branagh made Oscar history with three of his new film Belfast's seven nominations for his work as a writer, director and producer. Belfast director Kenneth Branagah responds to Oscar nominations

George Clooney says he and Brad Pitt accepted LESS money on their next movie so that they could ensure it would get a theatrical release Brad Pitt and George Clooney accepted less money for their upcoming movie in order to ensure that it would be released theatrically. George explained his reasoning in a Deadline interview. Brad and George took LESS money on movie to ensure theatrical release

Number one! Kendall Jenner's 818 Tequila is named the top new spirit brand introduced in 2021 with over 1.5million bottles shipped Jenner is just one of the celebrities who have entered the hot tequila market. Others are George Clooney and Rande Gerber with Casamigos, The Rock with Teremana. Kendall Jenner's 818 Tequila named the number one new spirit brand

George and Amal Clooney reunite with Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber for a night on the town at Nobu Malibu Clooney and Gerber, who have been friends for decades and sold their billion-dollar Casamigos tequila company in 2017, wrapped up in a warm embrace before heading off in their separate ways. George Clooney reunites with Cindy Crawford for a night on the town

George and Amal Clooney reunite with Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber for a night on the town at Nobu Malibu Clooney and Gerber, who have been friends for decades and sold their billion-dollar Casamigos tequila company in 2017, wrapped up in a warm embrace before heading off in their separate ways. George and Amal Clooney reunite with Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber

EXCLUSIVE: George Clooney and Julia Roberts jet out of Australia as Covid outbreak brings all work on Gold Coast movie set to a halt with crew 'dropping like flies' due to virus The Queensland production of Hollywood film Ticket to Paradise has been shut down and its stars George Clooney and Julia Roberts have returned to the US due to Covid cases in the state. Hollywood stars Clooney and Roberts head home as film is shut down

Move over George Clooney and The Rock! Mark Wahlberg is launching his own tequila brand: 'We plan on being the best' The Ted star, 50, has announced his collaboration with Flecha Azul, which was co-founded by Mexican PGA golfer Abraham Ancer and entrepreneur Aron Marquez. Mark Wahlberg is launching his own tequila brand

Ben Affleck totally unbothered by Snoop Dogg accidentally mispronouncing his name at the Golden Globe nominations Ben Affleck had a nice chuckle about rapper Snoop Dogg's accidental mispronunciation of his name while announcing this season's crop of Golden Globe nominees. Ben Affleck unbothered by Snoop Dogg mispronouncing his name

George Clooney enjoys a takeaway coffee as he continues filming Ticket to Paradise on the Gold Coast George Clooney is currently on the Gold Coast to film his new movie, Ticket to Paradise. George Clooney enjoys a coffee while filming movie on the Gold Coast

Ben Affleck says George Clooney was 'spectacular' in giving him more time to see his three kids during production of The Tender Bar Affleck, who shares daughters Violet, 16, and Seraphina, 12, and son Samuel, nine, with ex Jennifer Garner, 49, told the outlet that his 'life has really changed a lot.' Ben Affleck says George Clooney gave him more time to see his kids

George and Amal Clooney dine with Julia Roberts at a ritzy Brisbane hotel - as the Hollywood stars continue filming new movie Ticket to Paradise The trio are currently staying in Queensland while George and Julia film their new movie Ticket to Paradise George and Amal Clooney dine with Julia Roberts at a Brisbane hotel

'Holy moly!': Julia Roberts stuns Jimmy Kimmel as she hilariously gatecrashes George Clooney's interview about his directorial film The Tender Bar The actor, 60, had tuned in to talk about his directorial film The Tender Bar with child star Daniel Ranieri, 10, when Julia, 54, decided to make a surprise appearance. Julia Roberts hilariously crashes George Clooney's Kimmel interview

'Holy moly!': Julia Roberts stuns Jimmy Kimmel as she hilariously gatecrashes George Clooney's interview about his directorial film The Tender Bar The actor, 60, had tuned in to talk about his directorial film The Tender Bar with child star Daniel Ranieri, 10, when Julia, 54, decided to make a surprise appearance. Julia Roberts hilariously gatecrashes George Clooney's interview

George Clooney puts on an animated display as he and Julia Roberts continue filming their new movie Ticket to Paradise on the Gold Coast George Clooney put on a very animated display as he and Julia Roberts continued filming their new movie Ticket to Paradise on the Gold Coast on Wednesday. George Clooney and Julia Roberts pictured filming in the Gold Coast

Julia Roberts, 54, flashes her toned legs and megawatt smile while chatting to film producer Tim Bevan on a Gold Coast beach - as she takes a break from filming her new movie with George Clooney Julia Roberts showed off her never-ending pins and trademark megawatt smile on Monday, as she took a break from filming A Ticket to Paradise to meet her producer pal Tim Bevan in the Gold Coast. Julia Roberts, 54, flashes her legs in shorts at a Gold Coast beach

Julia Roberts attempts to go incognito in a cap and dark sunglasses as she goes for a walk on the Gold Coast during a break from filming her new movie with George Clooney Julia Roberts attempted to go incognito in a cap and dark sunglasses as she went for a walk on the Gold Coast in Australia on Sunday, during a break from filming her new movie with George Clooney. Julia Roberts takes break from filming ​new movie with George Clooney

Julia Roberts attempts to go incognito in a cap and dark sunglasses as she goes for a walk on the Gold Coast during a break from filming her new movie with George Clooney Julia Roberts, 54, is currently in Australia filming her new movie, A Ticket to Paradise, with George Clooney. On Sunday, the American star stepped out to enjoy a walk on the Gold Coast. Julia Roberts goes for a walk on the Gold Coast after filming

Lily Rabe shows off pregnancy glow in gorgeous pink gown for screening of George Clooney's coming-of-age film The Tender Bar in NYC Lily Rabe showed off her pregnancy glow in gorgeous pink gown for screening of George Clooney's coming-of-age film The Tender Bar in Los Angeles on Thursday. Lily Rabe oozes pregnancy glow in pink for screening of The Tender Bar

Everyday Ageism: CHRISTA D'SOUZA says George Clooney's comments about turning 60 are exactly what keeps the flag of ageism aloft George Clooney revealed his thoughts on ageing saying, 'turning 60 is a bummer. But it's that or dead'. UK-based columnist Christa D'Souza says his words are what keeps ageism aloft. CHRISTA D'SOUZA blasts George Clooney's comments about turning 60

George Clooney and Julia Roberts arrive by helicopter as they get to work filming their new movie Ticket to Paradise in The Whitsundays George Clooney and Julia Roberts are currently in Australia shooting their new romantic comedy, Ticket to Paradise, in The Whitsundays. George Clooney and Julia Roberts filming Ticket to Paradise

George Clooney and Julia Roberts' new movie Ticket to Paradise sees The Whitsundays transformed into Bali as filming gets underway on the upcoming Hollywood blockbuster The film set for Julia Roberts and George Clooney's romantic comedy, Ticket to Paradise, is starting to come to life in The Whitsundays in Queensland. Ticket to Paradise transforms The Whitsundays into Bali

George Clooney was 'gobsmacked' when wife Amal became pregnant with twins... as he recalls 'very emotional' moment they decided to have kids The 60-year-old actor recalled the challenges of planning for fatherhood after spending decades as Hollywood's most eligible bachelor as he chatted on the WTF with Marc Maron podcast. George Clooney was 'gobsmacked' when Amal became pregnant with twins

George Clooney slams Alec Baldwin and says having live bullets on his movie set is 'insane' and 'infuriating' George Clooney has said it was 'insane' and 'infuriating' that live bullets were on the set of Alec Baldwin 's film Rust, which resulted in the death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins. George Clooney slams Alec Baldwin for having live bullets on movie set

George Clooney says having live bullets on the set of fatal Alec Baldwin movie 'Rust' is 'insane': Blames 'skimping' on set and says he has never heard of the phrase 'cold gun' The Hollywood star, 60, said he has never known an assistant director being responsible for guns on set, after it was revealed David Halls and not the prop person or armorer declared the gun safe. George Clooney says it was 'insane' live bullets were on Rust film set

George Clooney describes Australian quarantine as '14 days until you're finally allowed to go out and breathe' - despite staying with his family and friends in a $9million mansion Images obtained by Daily Mail Australia last month showed that far from being cooped up in a CBD hotel, the Batman & Robin star stayed at a palatial $9million property 90 minutes from Sydney George Clooney complains about Oz quarantine despite his luxury digs

Waterways in the Whitsundays will be CLOSED for three days as George Clooney and Julia Roberts film romantic comedy Ticket to Paradise An exclusion zone has been established between Cid Island and Whitsunday Island from Tuesday, November 9, until Friday, November 12 Whitsundays waterways closed for three days to film Ticket to Paradise

Inside the luxury Hamilton Island resorts George Clooney and Julia Roberts are rumored to be staying at while the Hollywood stars film romantic comedy Ticket To Paradise While their actual itinerary is not known, George Clooney and Julia Roberts are likely to stay in these luxury Hamilton Island resorts Where George Clooney and Julia Roberts may be staying for new romcom

BAZ BAMIGBOYE: Cook, laundryman, doll's shoe-finder - and George Clooney even finds time to direct! BAZ BAMIGBOYE: Clooney tells me he enjoyed being stuck at home in LA with his family at the height of the pandemic. BAZ BAMIGBOYE: George Clooney manages to find time to direct!

Mystery surrounds Julia Roberts' $56.9million Sydney mansion as only a handful of super-rich renters know what it actually looks like inside The mansion has not been sold since 1997, giving it a sense of mystery because no photos of the interiors have been published in real estate listings since then Mystery surrounds Julia Roberts' $56.9million Sydney mansion

While George Clooney and Julia Roberts enjoy their 14-day quarantine at multi-million dollar mansions their Ticket to Paradise co-stars slum it in standard government-run hotels in Sydney's CBD George Clooney and Julia Roberts arrived in Sydney, Australia ahead of filming Ticket to Paradise and were whisked away to luxurious private homes to get through their 14-day quarantine periods. Ticket to Paradise stars stay in standard government-run hotels

Julia Roberts cuts a casual figure as she arrives at Sydney Airport on a private jet ahead of filming new movie with George Clooney in Queensland Julia Roberts has arrived in Sydney ahead of filming her new romantic comedy movie with George Clooney in Queensland. Julia Roberts she arrives in Sydney Airport on private jet

George Clooney arrives in Sydney with wife Amal and their children ahead of filming a new movie with Julia Roberts in Queensland George Clooney arrived in Sydney Airport with his family on Friday night, ahead of filming his new movie with Julia Roberts in Queensland. George Clooney arrives at Sydney Airport with wife Amal and their kids

Lucas Bravo of hit show Emily in Paris set to star opposite Julia Roberts and George Clooney in a new film Emily in Paris' Lucas Bravo has secured a role alongside Julia Roberts and George Clooney. The French-born actor has join the cast of Ticket to Paradise. Lucas Bravo cast with Julia Roberts and George Clooney in new film

The Tender Bar trailer: Ben Affleck is the cool uncle in a first look at a heartwarming new drama directed by George Clooney Amazon Studios will release The Tender Bar in select locations on December 17, 2021 and it will be shared globally on Amazon Prime Video on January 7, 2022. The Tender Bar trailer: Ben Affleck is the cool uncle

ER stars George Clooney and Julianna Margulies embrace during heartwarming reunion at special screening of The Tender Bar in NYC ER stars Julianna Margulies and George Clooney lit up when they embraced during a heart pumping reunion at special screening of The Tender Bar in New York City on Wednesday. ER stars Julianna Margulies and George Clooney reunite in NYC

Amal Clooney cuts a chic figure in a cream dress and lemon-yellow coat during outing in Washington D.C. Amal Clooney cut a chic figure in a cream dress and lemon-yellow coat during an outing in Washington D.C. on Tuesday. Amal Clooney cuts a chic figure in a cream dress and coat

George Clooney, 60, looks dapper in black suit while his wife Amal, 43, dons glittering white gown as the couple go for dinner with her family in Notting Hill The actor cut a dapper figure for the outing as he sported a black blazer and matching trousers along with a crisp white shirt. George Clooney and his wife Amal enjoy dinner in Notting Hill

George Clooney is every inch the doting husband as he assists wife Amal after her sequinned gown gets caught in her SHOE at The Tender Bar photocall during the London Film Festival The actor, 60, cut a dapper figure for the event as he joined his wife, 43, who dazzled in a beautiful white sequinned gown as they arrived for the photocall during the London Film Festival on Sunday. George Clooney cosies up to his wife Amal at The Tender Bar photocall

George Clooney cuts a dapper figure in a black polo shirt and jeans as he promotes The Tender Bar movie at the London Film Festival The actor, 60, looked dapper as he headed to Deadline's Contenders Presentation to promote his film The Tender Bar at London Film Festival on Saturday. George Clooney promotes The Tender Bar movie at London Film Festival

George Clooney's wife Amal reveals he's been teaching their two children pranks during the COVID-19 lockdown: 'I think those can really pay off' George Clooney's wife Amal has revealed that her husband has used the COVID-19 lockdown to teach his four-year-old twins Alexander and Ella the art of pulling pranks. George Clooney's wife Amal reveals he's been teaching pranks

Batmen reunite! Long-time pals and superhero stars Ben Affleck and George Clooney lark around on the red carpet at LA premiere of their new movie The Tender Bar The two-time Oscar winners have both had the honor of portraying DC Comics' Bruce Wayne/Batman on the big screen with varying degrees of success Ben Affleck goofs around with George Clooney at Tender Bar premiere

George Clooney looks classically handsome as he holds wife Amal close at the star studded premiere of his new film The Tender Bar in LA The Hollywood heartthrob attended the premiere of his latest directorial project, The Tender Bar, alongside wife Amal Clooney as the duo led stars at the event at the Director's Guild in LA George and Amal Clooney attend the premiere of The Tender Bar in LA
title: George Clooney: Latest news, views, gossip, photos and video
